articles.description: The overnight MCLR remained unchanged at 7.95%, but one month to three-year period MCLR has been increased by 5 bps.
articles.content: Bank of India stock gained over 2 percent in early trade on October 31 as the PSU Bank reported a revision in its lending rates. By 9:40 am, the stock was trading at Rs 98.30, around 2.82 percent hig… [+1359 chars]

articles.title: F&O Buzzer: Long built-up positions in Infosys, ICICI Bank and Kotak Bank - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Options data suggests Infosys, Kotak Bank, ICICI Bank, and Indian Hotels show significant long build-up in their positions.
articles.content:
According to the open interest data, there is an unusually heavy call unwinding and put writing in Infosys stock, indicating a potential uptrend in the stock on October 31.

articles.title: Lifting of Sebi ban on Punit Goenka to speed up Zee-Sony merger, say legal experts - Moneycontrol
articles.description: In the scenario where Sebi gives a go-ahead in favour of Goenka, without going to the Supreme Court, analysts expect the Zee and Sony merger to complete by November
articles.content: The Securities Appellate Tribunal (SAT) move to set aside the Sebi interim order against former Zee Enterprises Limited (ZEEL) chief Punit Goenka will speed up the company's merger with Sony Pictures… [+3943 chars]
